name: Shingata Kururin Pa!
description: Shingata Kururin Pa! refines the original game's formula with a few new features. This time around, if a fire block is dropped in a place where it has nothing to burn, it will smoulder in place until a nearby fire helps it burst into flames; this allows the player to build some much more complex combos. Each character now also has a unique block type with its own effects.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita, SEGA Saturn | Combined View
